CmdLine: sed 's@session\s*required\s*pam_loginuid.so@session optional pam_loginuid.so@g' -i /etc/pam.d/sshd &&     sed -i 's/PermitRootLogin without-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&     sed -i 's/#StrictModes yes/StrictModes no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&     sed -i 's@HostKey .*@HostKey /root/.ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key@' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
